definitions.definition: An ancient country in Italian Peninsula , located between the Arno and Tiber rivers, corresponding to modern day Tuscany in Western Italy ; the home of Etruscans .
A former kingdom in Northern Italy ,  lasted between 1801 and 1807.
A suburb of Stoke-on-Trent , Staffordshire , England ( OS grid ref SJ8646 ) .

main_definition: ( historical ) An ancient country in Italian Peninsula , located between the Arno and Tiber rivers, corresponding to modern day Tuscany in Western Italy ; the home of Etruscans .
